title: Romo reaction & free agency roundup
itunes:title: Romo reaction & free agency roundup
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Chris Wesseling, Gregg Rosenthal & Marc Sessler– discuss the best possible fits for Tony Romo after it was reported the Cowboys would release the veteran QB on Thursday. Then, the heroes break down all the latest free agency moves and rumors from around the league including wide receiver Brandon Marshall signing with the Giants, and the Bills agreeing to a restructured contract with quarterback Tyrod Taylor.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
